item.title: A Server Status

item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“2119inurbox, post:24, topic:281714”]@PeeHPee: ye, with INLINE ASSEMBLY

@T4_: funny how you mix things around to protect the reputation you have been trying to build up[/quote]
Didn’t switch anything around, you’ve never owned an ircd (that I know of). I bought it from xygenhosting ($5/mo), wonder if I can find my transaction logs…

Edit: asked around and:

[abraham2119@live.com (26.04.09)] abraham2119: * since im loading info from http server in my botnet * i made leet encryption * impossible to crack * watch * 35120316-57409816-24049198-910 * tell me somehting to encrypt in my encryption method

item.title: A Server Status
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“2119inurbox, post:21, topic:281714”][quote author=PeeHPee link=topic=372170.msg2819309#msg2819309 date=1244493597]

[quote author=2119inurbox link=topic=372170.msg2819294#msg2819294 date=1244493045]

even if its widely used, does it mean its good? perfect example of this is .net

i would simply use jsp

jsp sucks dick, fuck off.
[/quote]php sucks dick, fuck off.

no need to defend just because it is the only language you are familiar with.

only language i’m familiar with?

i’m MORE than familiar with C, C#, java and php. i can write asm, perl, python and about 10 other proramming languages so please tell me how its the only language im familiar with?

i’m defending php because you clearly don’t know what you’re talking about and are giving a biased opinion.

an example of what you are saying is ASM, which was invented in the 1940’s and is still used today. so do us all a favour and shut the fuck up

[/quote]i doubt you are familiar with half of the languages you mentioned, but no matter, nobody uses ASM today…

the only reason one would use ASM today would be when associating it with C (aka inline assembly) or simply disassemblying an application…so no, it is not a perfect example.

@T4_: dont try to act intelligent because iirc you were the one who always came begging to me for help. stop sucking up to people + fuck off[/quote]
The hell are you on about? Why would I ever ask advice/help from someone like yourself. IIrc you asked me if you could host a botnet on an ircd I once had - I of course said no. Stop ban-evading and fuck off.

Read full topic

item.title: A Server Status
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

kloplop321:

and a web host of which allows pinging(mine does not)

That’s not pining (ICMP echo), it’s opening and closing a (TCP) socket on the host that is supposedly open and listening.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

Have some knowledge in PHP, learn how to create MYSQL tables.
You will need a source, which is located somewhere in this section dowload it and simply implement it.
Obviously you will also need a webhost.

Read full topic

item.title: A Server Status
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

Sorry about my mis-interpretation(like 1 AM for me?)! yeah, a cron job with a MySQL table of what to check. though I would only have it check locations that have a 20% online chance or higher automatically, to not waste resources. Pinging every single visit would be horrific to the server!

Read full topic

item.title: A Server Status
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

SO many posts with the same question, can’t people use Search?[/quote]Wrong topic lol… He doesn’t want the agreement page, he wants the server status. =o

item.title: A Server Status
item.dc:creator: @communist communist
item.description:
@communist wrote:

Just get each page on a cron job(We don’t wanna waste resources…) every 15-30 minuites getting the status of each web pace (Check for error with CURL.)

[quote=“kloplop321, post:4, topic:281714”]do a cookie check, then if they do not have a cookie saying “yes I pressed the button” then redirect using the header function.
SO many posts with the same question, can’t people use Search?[/quote]
Excuse me?
